ValidationRule.description: Once a date is entered into the Date Inspected field, it cannot be edited after.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( RecordType.Name = 'Commercial Claim', RecordType.Name = 'Residential Claim' ), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", ISCHANGED( DateInspected__c ), NOT ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE( DateInspected__c ))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The value in Date Inspected field cannot be changed.
